h3_title: Captain Wise-Voice Boss Fight and Guide
content: Eventually, you'll see the entire floor light up with criss-crossing lines over almost every inch of the surface. Keep dodging the lightning strikes, and as soon as the floor glows red, hop onto your Pillar Stance to extend off the ground (the more stamina you have built up, the better).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Captain_Wise-Voice.md', within the main section titled 'Captain Wise-Voice', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Captain Wise-Voice' and the sub-subsection 'Captain Wise-Voice Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Eventually, you'll see the entire floor light up with criss-crossing lines over almost every inch of the surface. Keep dodging the lightning strikes, and as soon as the floor glows red, hop onto your Pillar Stance to extend off the ground (the more stamina you have built up, the better).
